RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $6,500, allowed 2 lbs. sidered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOKY TOPAZ in the second fight outside, began to advance on the leader second turn, reeled that rival in entering the stretch, gained the advantage, clear late, lasted. PAYDAY TOO bothered slightly at the break, trailed well back for six furlongs, belated rally off the inside, getting to the winner late. DUKE OF BLUE RIDGE broke in but alertly, cleared into the first turn while a bit slow to settle, continued to show the way onto the backstretch, extended that advantage before a half, continued to hold a sizable advantage far turn, offered little resistance to the winner upper stretch, faltered when headed. MATH MAN lacked early foot along with the winner, came on the outside for the drive, failed to muster a rally in passing only a single tiring rival. SCREENPLAY chased the leader from along the inside, had nothing left for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Screenplay
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Math Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Payday Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bother break, trailed, coming outside

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Blue Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in but alertly, pace off rail, extended lead, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Smoky Topaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, reeled in leader, clear, lasted

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECIAL OPERATOR brush at the start, raced back off the pace, ranged up four wide to challenge midway on the turn, floated out five wide into the stretch, roused, closed with good resolve to be up in time. TEXAS TURBINE brushed at the start, in the second flight early off the inside, closer three wide into the turn, vied between foes into the stretch, took over, clear inside the furlong marker, nailed in the final strides. MR. WIMBLEDON BAY behind the early pace inside, continued behind horses early in the turn, steered out four wide late in the bend, lacked the needed closing punch to test the top two, well clear of the others. BYATHREAD last to leave, lacked speed, waited midway on the turn, went evenly through the lane when clear. FREEWHEELER broke out and on top, cleared to the inside, vied through the turn then faltered in the drive. JANET'S DEVIL broke through the gge and ran off a short distance, reloaded, broke with the field, prompted the issue up the backstretch off the inside, bid between horses turn, gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Wimbledon Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside, steered 4w late turn, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Byathread
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, waited 5/16, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Janet's Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, prompted pace, bid btwn foes turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Turbine
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start, 2nd flight early, closer 3w turn, took over, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Special Operator
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start, off pace, floated 5w into lane, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Freewheeler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out and on top, cleared, pace inside, faltered drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVIL'S HARVEST fractious prestart heading to the gate, broke well, soon clear, rated in the run up the backstretch and into the far turn, plenty left through the lane to maintain daylight to the wire. RED OCTOBER raced in mid pack off the inside, between horses far turn, came three wide for the drive, finished willingly to be closing the gap on the winner late. NEPHI moved up to race closest to the winner first turn, continued to pursue that one the middle half, had little for that rival in the drive, caught for the runner up spot. TACTICAL VISION went one paced throughout along the inside. STEP ON IT broke in the air, raced well back off the pace, four wide into the lane when making a mild advance, lacked a closing kick. ASTERN BANKER settled off the pace and the inside, also lacked a closing bid. SIMPLY WOW fell back to trail after the start and never menaced. G'S LAW in mid pack into the first turn, was finished after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Wow
ENTRY.OWNER: Richards Corale A and Scott Bruce
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout toward the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Step On It
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, back off pace, 4w into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Red October
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, btwn foes second, 3w into lane, willingly, closing gap

ENTRY.NAME: Nephi
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, little left, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Harvest
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious prestart, away well, clear, rated, plenty left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, lacked closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: G's Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, finished after a half

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 20, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $ 10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGEEZ off a step slow, trailed for five furlongs, swung five wide out of the second turn when advanced, finished willingly to be up down the middle of the strip. MUFFIN NUTS pressed the early leader from the outside, joined that one before a half, showed the way into the far turn, larger advantage into the stretch, responded when challenged by the winner inside the furlong grounds, proved stubborn to the end. COACH KENNY within striking distance, tried the runner up from the outside turning for home, failed to sustain that effort to the wire. NO PEDIGREE broke on top, early pace inside, dueled backstretch, fell back, moved out, steadied late second turn, three wide into the lane, had little left. FREEDOMFI settled off the pace and the inside, three wide through the second turn, lacked a closing kick. COOL INDIVIDUAL was finished after four furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Mageez
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, swung 5w into lane, up mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, bid late 2nd, flattened out drive

ENTRY.NAME: No Pedigree
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, fell back, moved out, std'd 1/4,3w,little left

ENTRY.NAME: Muffin Nuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, dueled, took over, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Individual
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after four furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Freedomfi
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, 3w 2nd turn, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7 1/2F Turf CR: 81. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEZ OUR ARCH closest to the two leaders through the first turn and onto the backstretch, patiently handled into the far turn, asked along with some encouragement soon after, came three wide for the drive, engaged the leader inside the furlong grounds, wore that rival down to edge clear late under steady handling. RIPTIDE ROSE broke well from the outside, cleared to the rail early in the first turn, dueled up the backstretch, put that rival away to be clear again upper straight, responded and gave ground grudgingly to the winner until late, held the place. ABSOLUTELY in mid pack, off the inside into the lane, dropped to the rail, made a bid for the runner up spot but did not have enough. PLANTS AND BIRDS last away, lacked early foot, roused on the outside turning for home, managed a mild rally to improve position. TOLATETOOWAIT went one paced throughout in lacking a closing response. SARATOGA PASODOBLE moved out into the first turn, dueled up the backstretch in the two path, began to weaken final turn. RAISE THE PRAISE broke back, trailed most of the way and never menaced. STAR FASHION broke back, was also not involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Plants and Birds
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, mild rally outside

ENTRY.NAME: Absolutely
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, between foes into lane, dropped inside, not enuf 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tolatetoowait
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Our Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to two leaders, patient, asked, 3w 1/4,bid,wore down foe

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Praise
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed most of the way, never menace

ENTRY.NAME: Star Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Pasodoble
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out, advanced to duel 2p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, cleared to inside, dueled, shook clear, grudingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RYAN'S GRACE pressed the soft early pace, vied between foes up the backstretch, dueled into the lane, continued to alternate past the furlong marker, dug in late to narrowly prevail in a game effort. THROUGH THE CRACKS vied four wide through the first turn, vied through the second, dueled outside the winner the length of the stretch, narrowly missed. EASY ACT void of speed for five furlongs, began to move closer while four wide late in the second turn, roused, shifted out widest soon after, rallied to be slowly getting to the top two late. AUNT JANA settled off the pace and the inside, closer second turn, lacked a further meaningful bid down the lane. OVERLY SWEET fell back to trail after the start, continued to lag far turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a threat. SARATOGA KAREN away best of all, forwardly placed early through some soft fractions, began a steady fade before a half. ROSIE SPRIT away in good order, set a soft early pace while a bit keen, vied up the backstretch then gave way readily in the second turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Jana
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, closer 2nd turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Ryan's Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed soft pace, vied btwn middle half, long duel, game

ENTRY.NAME: Overly Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, picked off couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Karen
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Through the Cracks
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4w 1st, vied 2nd, stretch duel, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, roused 4w 1/4,moved out, slow gain top two

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie Sprit
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, soft splits, keen, gave way readily 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUCHDOWN JOE broke on top, showed the way into the first turn under a hold, set a soft set of fractions along the inside, continued to show the way into the lane, drifted out, held late under firm handling. SCORING DRIVE behind the pace inside, came in the two path for the drive, closest to the winner with a bid a sixteenth out, not enough for the winner late while edging clear for the place. MARTINIZED prompted the winner off the inside early, joined that one after a half, dueled through the final turn and began to weaken into the stretch, narrowly lasted for the show. CHEERFOR MSHAWISH within striking distance while three wide through the first turn, maintained contact with the leaders into the far bend, dropped inside, asked, one paced to the wire in lacking a closing punch. BATTLE OF WILL forwardly placed early inside, fell back while continuing to save ground, lacked a response in the drive. SARAH'S VISION broke in to bother inner rivals, lacked speed, three wide, improved slightly, never dangerous. HOLIDAY DIAMOND pushed in then was forced to steady by SARAH'S VISION at the break, remained back in lacking a rally. YOUR TIME'S COMING also bothered at the break, checked up, trailed early as a result, moved up to mid pack before a half, gave way into lane. HENNING four wide when with the main body first turn, continued outside, four wide into the far bend, backed up through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, fell back, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Touchdown Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, set soft pace, drift stretch, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Your Time's Coming
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, checked up break, closer after a half, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Diamond
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastien Ronald J and Sebastien Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in, steadied, bothered start, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed off rail, improved slightly 3w, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside, 2p into lane, bid late, not good enuf

ENTRY.NAME: Cheerfor Mshawish
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance 3w, one paced middle half, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Henning
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, 4-3w 2nd, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Martinized
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted leader, dueled second turn, weakened, lasted show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 120 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 20, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Clai ming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY DREAMER within striking distance early outside, moved closer while four wide through the turn, lost ground to the leader well outside that one into the lane, late surge to be up in the final strides. FORGOTTEN FORTUNE also within contact of the early leader, closer with the winner inside that one turn, also lost ground to fall back off the leader upper stretch, late push to be up for the place at the wire between horses. LUMINOUS FLIGHT broke on top, showed the way up the backstretch inside, continued to show the way turn, clear again when straightened for home, could not last while inside the top two at the wire. COPPER MOON closest to the leader early, fell back inside, saved ground through the turn, continued inside and lacked a closing kick. CINCY'S ANNA lacked speed early inside, moved out, came 4w into lane, made little impact in the run to the wire. DIXIE FARMER stumbled at the start, recovered and was used to move up into a forward position, closest turn between foes, gave way in the stretch. BYE BYE BIG BABY last away, trailed throughout to show little.

ENTRY.NAME: Cincy's Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, moved outside, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Big Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, fell back, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Farmer
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, used early, closer turn, faltered drive

ENTRY.NAME: Luminous Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early pace, shook clear upper, could not last

ENTRY.NAME: Forgotten Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer 3w and btwn turn, fell back, up late 2nd between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer 4w turn, lost ground, late surge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALENTS HOT DEAL away in good order, quickly sprinted clear, held a daylight advantage through the turn when given a bit of a breather, enough left late to withstand the runner up. SHOTGUN ANNIE fell back after the start, four wide into the lane, finished willingly late to be getting the winner late. CHARMING KAT lacked speed along the inside, continued to save ground turn, closer past midstretch, closed the gap a bit on the winner late while outkicked for the second spot. MINT JULIUS lacked speed, three wide through the turn, roused for the drive, pinched back a furlong out, finished up evenly after recovering. SEEMYVALENTINE broke alertly, chased the winner up the backstretch, weakened in the drive. MALLORY UNBRIDLED in the second flight outside, was tiring nearing midstretch when she lugged in shutting off MINT JULIUS, continued to weaken to the wire. LA LOLA was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Charming Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed inside, closer stretch, outkicked late for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Talents Hot Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, soon clear, breather turn, held late

ENTRY.NAME: La Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Seemyvalentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Mallory Unbridled
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, tiring when lugging in midstretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mint Julius
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w trip, pinched 1/8, evenly to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Shotgun Annie
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, 4w into lane, willingly late, coming
